name: TheAtlantic
text: "Cynical public speech aimed at winning political power had consequences in 1860, and it surely will have consequences now," @rachelshelden writes: https://t.co/Kv4N22vI00

name: TheAtlantic
text: "In a criminal-justice system characterized by its inhumanity, the pardon power is capable of only one thing, something more spiritual than legal: mercy," @Oslerguy writes: https://t.co/rPmjFerPHD
